It was released on Betamax and later on laserdisc. This movie is a heartwarming story about a half Inuit girl named Smilla who inherits her deceased father's large and beautiful mansion in the countryside of Greenland.  As she spends more time in the mansion, Smilla discovers that many valuable items were lost when her father was killed by his own hand while on guard duty at Fort Bragg in North Carolina on September 15th 1986. As a result of this discovery, Smilla embarks on a journey to find and recover the lost items so as to bring some closure to her grieving father's spirit and legacy in Greenland.

Based on the preferences and interest in science fiction, the following movie recommendations from the list you provided would be of interest:
